Class ContinuousIntegrationServer

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
ContinuousIntegrationServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
public class ContinuousIntegrationServer extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
Skeleton of a ContinuousIntegrationServer which acts as webhook See the Jetty documentation for API documentation of those classes.

    • handle

      public void handle(String target, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request baseRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getLatestCommitMessageFromPush

      public String getLatestCommitMessageFromPush(String payload)
      This function extracts the latest commit message from the push event payload. It uses the Gson library to parse the JSON payload and extract the commit message. If no commits are found, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      payload - - The JSON payload from the push event
      Returns:
      The latest commit message

    • cloneRepository

      public void cloneRepository(String repoUrl, String baseCloneDirPath, String uniqueDirName)
      Clones a Git repository to a specified directory. The repository is cloned to a unique directory name generated from the commit hash and the current time.
      Parameters:
      repoUrl - the URL of the repository to clone.
      baseCloneDirPath - the base path to the directory where the repository will be cloned.
      uniqueDirName - the hash of the commit to clone.

    • compileMavenProject

      public boolean compileMavenProject(String projectDirPath, String uniqueDirName, String payload)
      Compiles the Maven project and runs tests.
      Parameters:
      projectDirPath - the path to the directory where the Maven project is located.
      uniqueDirName - the unique directory name generated from the commit hash and the current time.
      payload - the JSON payload received from the webhook.

    • sendBuildResultEmail

      public void sendBuildResultEmail(String toEmail, String subject, String projectDirPath, String uniqueDirName)
      This function sends an email notification with the build result.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - - The email address to send the notification to
      subject - - The subject of the email
      projectDirPath - - The path to the directory where the Maven project is located
      uniqueDirName - - The unique directory name generated from the commit hash and the current time

    • removeClonedRepository

      public void removeClonedRepository(String cloneDirPath, String uniqueDirName)
      Removes the cloned repository from the file system. This function deletes the cloned repository directory and all its contents, except for the build summary file.
      Parameters:
      cloneDirPath - the path to the directory where the repository was cloned.
      uniqueDirName - the unique directory name generated from the commit hash and the current time.

    • extractEmail

      public String extractEmail(String payload)
      Extracts the email of the committer from the webhook payload.
      Parameters:
      payload - - The JSON payload received from the webhook
      Returns:
      The email of the committer

    • extractRepositoryUrl

      public String extractRepositoryUrl(String payload)
      Extracts the repository clone URL from the webhook payload. This function uses the Gson library to parse the JSON payload and extract the repository URL. If the repository URL cannot be extracted, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      payload - the JSON payload received from the webhook.
      Returns:
      the clone URL of the repository.

    • extractRepositoryName

      public String extractRepositoryName(String payload)
      Extracts the repository name from the webhook payload.
      Parameters:
      payload -
      Returns:
      the name of the repository

    • extractBranchName

      public String extractBranchName(String payload)
      Extracts the branch name from the webhook payload.
      Parameters:
      payload -
      Returns:
      the name of the branch

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      This function starts the CI server on port 8028.
      Parameters:
      args - - Command line arguments
      Throws:
      Exception
